nodes.text: Kylo Ren and Darth Vader - A Legacy of Power
"Kylo Ren and Darth Vader - A Legacy of Power" is the thirty-eighth episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel on March 13, 2020.
The video opens with a full shot of Darth Vader's burned helmet. Kylo Ren calls upon his grandfather to show him the power of darkness again.

Kylo Ren experiences a Force vision of Lord Vader killing Rebel troopers during the Battle of Scarif. The narrator explains that in a "galaxy of adventures", Kylo Ren follows in the footsteps of Darth Vader. Shots of Vader attacking a rebel soldier on Hoth, Kylo attacked an unseen person, and Vader and Obi-Wan Kenobi dueling aboard the Death Star.

We then see footage of Kylo Ren and Luke dueling on Crait. This is followed by shots of Vader and Kylo Ren inspecting stormtroopers from both the Empire and First Order. Returning to the present, Kylo Ren gazes at Vader's helmet reverently before donning his newly repaired helmet.
